name: Cannon Shell
description: A large artillery shell. Used as ammunition for the Mek Siege Cannon Module.

name: Cryofridge
description: Requires electricity to run. Keeps Cryopods alive forever!

name: Delivery Crate
description: A box with a Gasbag attached that can be used to deliver items to another location.

name: Dino Leash
description: Electronic leash to keep your dinos from wandering too far.

name: Empty Cryopod
description: Hold up to a creature to capture it. Throw to deploy a captured creature.

name: Gacha Saddle
description: Equip a Gacha with this to ride it.

name: Gasbags Saddle
description: Equip a Gasbags with this to ride it.

name: Large Taxidermy Base
description: Place a harvested dermis to show off your prowess!

name: M.D.S.M.
description: Mek Deployable Shield Module. Equip a Mek with this module to arm it with a large deployable dome shield. Unequipping reduces durability.

name: M.O.M.I.
description: MegaMek Operational Materialization Interface. Drag this to a Mek Module slot to enable forming the MegaMek! Requires three additional nearby Meks to transform. Will fail to operate unless in range of the Alpha King Titan.

name: M.R.L.M.
description: Mek Rocket Launcher Module. Equip a Mek with this module to arm it with a wide reaching swarm-fire rocket launcher. Unequipping reduces durability. Requires Rocket Pods to fire.

name: M.S.C.M.
description: Mek Siege Cannon Module. Equip a Mek with this module to arm it with a powerful long-range siege cannon. Unequipping reduces durability. Requires Cannon Shells to fire.

name: Managarmr Saddle
description: Equip a Managarmr with this to ride it.

name: Medium Taxidermy Base
description: Place a harvested dermis to show off your prowess!

name: Rocket Pod
description: A pod containing 16 swarm-fire rockets. Used as ammunition for the Mek Rocket Launcher Module.

name: Small Taxidermy Base
description: Place a harvested dermis to show off your prowess!

name: Snow Owl Saddle
description: Equip a Snow Owl with this to ride it.

name: Summon Alpha King Titan
description: Use this to summon the Alpha King Titan

name: Summon Beta King Titan
description: Use this to summon the Beta King Titan

name: Summon Desert Titan
description: Use this to summon the Desert Titan

name: Summon Forest Titan
description: Use this to summon the Forest Titan

name: Summon Gamma King Titan
description: Use this to summon the Gamma King Titan

name: Summon Ice Titan
description: Use this to summon the Ice Titan

name: Taxidermy Tool
description: Used to capture the Dermis of a dead creature.

name: Tek Bridge
description: Extendable force bridge

name: Tek Gravity Grenade
description: Pulling the pin starts a 5 second timer to an explosion. Make sure you've thrown it by then.

name: Unassembled Enforcer
description: Use this item to assemble a new Enforcer!

name: Unassembled Mek
description: Use this item to assemble a new Mek!

name: Velonasaur Saddle
description: Equip a Velonasaur with this to ride it.
